thread.title: Horrifying moment toddler is life dangling from 30ft high theme park ride after slipping through seat designed for older children
thread.title_full: Horrifying moment toddler is life dangling from 30ft high theme park ride after slipping through seat designed for older children

author: hcrouch
title: Horrifying moment toddler is life dangling from 30ft high theme park ride after slipping through seat designed for older children
text:
Opinion INCHES FROM DEATH Horrifying moment toddler is life dangling from 30ft high theme park ride after slipping through seat designed for older children 
The dramatic incident is believed to have taken place at a children's amusement park in China By Hannah Crouch 13th February 2017, 11:51 am VIRAL footage has captured the moment a toddler was left hanging from the seat of a theme park ride after he slipped through the protective equipment designed for children much older. 
The dramatic incident is believed to have taken place at a children’s amusement park in China, where the staff somehow permitted the young boy to go on the “drop tower” ride. AsiaWire Footage has captured the moment a toddler was left hanging from the seat of a theme park ride after he slipped through protective equipment designed for children much older AsiaWire 2 The child is safely removed from the ride after operators stopped the machine 
Footage of the scare on China’s microblogging site, Sina Weibo, has already been viewed almost a million times. 
It shows the boy as well as a number of older children seated on one side of the thrilling drop tower ride, which begins jerking upwards and downwards after employees turn it on. 
The mobile phone clip is filmed from the crowd, where the child’s parents are apparently also standing and where the boy’s high-pitched cries and screams can be heard. RELATED STORIES FAIRGROUND HORROR Fairground bosses fined nearly £30k after girl, 8, had her EAR ripped off when ride flipped over TAKEN FOR A RIDE Fairground victim's fury at being offered FREE RIDE after horror crash left blood gushing from his head STOMACH-CHURNING Child filmed vomiting on dizzying ride fairground ride at Texas State Fair in hilarious slo-mo video DON'T LOOK DOWN Shocking moment man films himself on fairground ride that snaps...after joking 'the ride will break' FAIRGROUND RESCUE Fire crews save 19 people including six children trapped on a fairground ride in London 
Moments into the rise, the boy’s cries are echoed by the onlooker’s gasps as the child’s small body slips through the chair and begins sliding down into thin air. 
For several heart-stopping moments the boy dangles dangerously by his chest as the machine continues to rise and fall. 
The operators stopped the machine shortly afterwards and the terrified child was helped to the ground. 
There have so far been no confirmed reports of the location and the date of the incident and no names mentioned in reports. 
The 14-year-old was pronounced dead at hospital following failed resuscitation attempts, it has been reported. 
The unidentified teenager was at a fairground inside Zhaohua Park in Fengdu County.
